summary: Newly-arrived Ahmed tries to integrate his family to the canadian society, while attempting to control his son's life orientation.
cast: Zinedine Soualem|Hiam Abbass|Raba Aït Ouyahhia|Catherine Trudeau|Kenza Abiabdillah|Marc Beaupré|Koumba Ball|Raymond Cloutier|Gary Boudreault|Igor Ovadis|François Papineau|Maude Guérin|Pierre Muzadi|Françoise Lemieux|Alexandrine Agostini|Andreas Apergis|Mark Berube|Jocelyn Blanchard|Inés Canepa|Antoine Carabinier-Lépine|Richard Champagne|Régent Couturier|Patricia Darilus|Mathalie Derome|Louise Deslières|Patrick Drolet|Martin Dubreuil|Katia Duguay|François Dupuy|François Fauteux|Marie-Soleil Fortin|Pierre-Alexandre Fortin|Guy Germain|Dean Hagopian|Neil Kroetsch|Nicolas Lauriault|Véronique Marchand|Marthe Mercure|Dany Michaud|Raymond Noël|Henri Pardo|Patrice Robitaille|Marc St-Martin|Luc St. Denis|Claude Talbot|Denis Trudel
title: L'ange de goudron
